adversarial_expansion_patterns.name: Recently Used Section
adversarial_expansion_patterns.description: Separate section displaying 'recently used' capabilities, ordered by recency, limited to top 5

adversarial_expansion_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default preference and compresses decision space
adversarial_expansion_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 13 (No 'Commonly Used' or 'Recently Used'), J2 Constraint 5 (No State Memory), DENY-007

adversarial_expansion_patterns.name: Frequently Used Highlighting

adversarial_expansion_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 2 (No Highlighting or Recommendation), J2 Constraint 13 (No 'Commonly Used' or 'Recently Used'), DENY-008
